duties_responsibilities.duty: Formulate recommendations and implement solutions to technical issues in the field of tax management.
Participate in training and maintaining current technical knowledge in the area of tax management.
Develop and maintain complete knowledge of the firm's philosophy, reports, policies, procedures, and opinions on financial matters.
Lead and guide a responsible, knowledgeable, and trained staff in the field of tax management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Accounting
